<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Transaction Confirmation Status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/{network}/transaction/confirmed/{transactionID}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the confirmation status of a transaction

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"network","in":"path","description":"The network (mainnet or testnet)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["mainnet","testnet"]}},{"name":"transactionID","in":"path","description":"The transaction ID (hex)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"successful operation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"result":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the transaction is confirmed"}},"title":"ConfirmationResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid transaction ID"},"404":{"description":"Transaction not found"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
